Comment: A unique ID number for the transaction.
The name of the supplier on the transaction.
The ID number of the location on the transaction.
The shipping reference on the transaction.
This field contains 'Y' if the receipt has been completed.
Any receipt notes on the transaction.
This field contains 'Y' if the receipt has been invoiced.
The GL batch number on the transaction.
The shipment number on the transaction.
The ID number of the supplier (Creditor) account.
The reversal status. Will be one of:0 = Normal1 = Reversed2 = Reversal
For reversals, this field contains the source Inwards Goods ID number.
The period to which the receipt belongs.
The session ID for the record.
The ID number of the last invoice generated against the receipt.
